SEARCH
Package com.onlinebookstore.controller

Class BookController

java.lang.Object
com.onlinebookstore.controller.BookController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/books") @Validated public class BookController extends Object
A RESTful controller that manages and provides endpoints related to books.

  • Method Details

    • addBook

      @PostMapping("/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Book> addBook(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Book book)
      Adds a new book to the store. Any "id" value in the payload is ignored as it's supposed to be system-generated. Checks if any required fields are empty or null and rejects payload if true.
      Parameters:
      book - The book entity to be added.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the added book or an error message.

    • getBook

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Book> getBook(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a specific book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the book to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the retrieved book or an error message.

    • getAllBooks

      @GetMapping public List<Book> getAllBooks()
      Fetches all books available in the store.
      Returns:
      List of all books.

    • removeBook

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> removeBook(@PathVariable Long id)
      Removes a specific book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the book to be removed.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • updateBookQuantity

      @PutMapping("/{id}/quantity") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Book> updateBookQuantity(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Integer quantity)
      Updates the quantity of a specific book.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the book to be updated.
      quantity - The new quantity for the book.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated book or an error message.

    • getBookQuantity

      @GetMapping("/{id}/quantity") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Integer> getBookQuantity(@PathVariable Long id)
      Fetches the quantity of a specific book.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the book whose quantity is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the quantity of the book.

    • searchBooks

      @PostMapping("/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Book>> searchBooks(@RequestBody SearchBookDTO searchCriteria)
      Searches for books based on the given search criteria. The criteria can include fields such as title, author, and ISBN. The search operation uses fuzzy matching to provide results that closely match the provided criteria, even if they're not exact. For instance, if "Har" is provided in the title, it may return books titled "Harry Potter" or "Harbour".
      Parameters:
      searchCriteria - The DTO containing fields such as title, author, and ISBN to specify the search parameters. Each of these fields is optional, allowing for flexible searches.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of books that match the provided criteria. If no matches are found, an empty list is returned.

    • filterBooks

      @PostMapping("/filter") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Book>> filterBooks(@RequestBody FilterBookDTO filterCriteria)
      Filters books based on the provided criteria. This method is designed to narrow down results by focusing on specific attributes such as price range and availability. The filter can be set to focus on a range of prices or filter out books that aren't available in stock. For example, specifying a minPrice and maxPrice will return books priced within that range. Specifying avail as true will return only those books that are currently in stock.
      Parameters:
      filterCriteria - The DTO containing fields such as minPrice, maxPrice, and avail to specify the filter parameters. Each of these fields is optional, allowing for flexible filtering.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of books that match the provided filter criteria. If no matches are found, an empty list is returned.
